item.title: Unreal+houdini+linux
item.description: ⬛️ links and before we begin https://github.com/EpicGames/UnrealEngine?tab=readme-ov-file#getting-up-and-running https://www.sidefx.com/forum/topic/61839/?page=1#post-404735 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TOpdnwBxEq4 (unlisted video, for UE4, but helpful stuff, sourcing houdini environment (the most useful part) at around 27:40) during houdini installation, choose the plugins you’ll want / need, otherwise install those now for the version you’re on (a lot of the time, the most recent bleeding edge version won’t play well with compiling alongside UE) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=600RgBneV_A (newer video, Manjaro base, UE5.1) ⬛️ First things make the directory for UE5 and switch to it git clone git@github.
